description:
In this course you will be able to learn how to sell domains and web hosting and many more online tools under your name on your website, this course is a step by step videos, that will help you understand every aspect of this business effortlessly. Here is the list of the things that you going to learn when taking this course.

  • Learn how to set up your store front website
  • Learn how to use free products that come with the reseller plan
  • Learn how to use tools
  • Learn how to use promotions to boost your reseller business
  • Learn how to create coupons for yourself and your family
  • Learn how to create banner ads for your business
  • Learn how ask for help when it needed.


So what products you want to sell if you know how to sell? well, we will teach you how to sell. Domains, Web Hosting, VPS hosting, Dedicated Servers, Email Marketing, Website Builders, SSL certificates, Sitelock Security, Managed WordPress hosting, Online Storage and much more.

Why you should take this course?

Well, if you want to create an online business under your name and sell domains and web hosting, then this course is for you.

You don't need any special skills to set up the your reseller store, we will go though all of that in clear and easy to follow videos
title: Sell Domains and Web Hosting Under Your Name
